Starting CellNetAnalyzer (CNA):
*******************************

*read the manual of CNA, in particular section Quickstart 
(you find the manual in the "doc" directory") .

*start MATLAB from the main directory of CNA 
(or make the CNA directory the working directory 
in MATLAB) 

*enter "startcna" in the MATLAB command window

* choose a network project from the Project Manager 
and click on "Start"
